Rock_Hill.KHC27: KHC27 (sometimes referred to as Rock Hill All Hazards) is a 1000-Watt NOAA Weather/All Hazards radio station broadcasting from Rock Hill, South Carolina on an assigned frequency of 162.425 MHz. The station coverage area serves the upstate of South Carolina and parts of the southern piedmont in North Carolina with weather and hazard information. This station's feed is heard through SAP on WOLO 25.3 and WCCB 18.3.
